arStrings.szText: Each time an enemy attacks you the damage they take from {c_important}Payback{/c} is increased by {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%x|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_14}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_15} * {SF_16} *100|%x|]{/c}.

Becoming Control Impaired while {c_important}Payback{/c} is on Cooldown makes it free to cast and grants you {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} seconds. Can only occur once every {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Payback{/c} passively grants you Vigor when you take damage. {c_important}Payback{/c} is now also a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill and consumes all available Vigor to increase its damage by {c_number}[{SF_6}*100|1%x|]{/c} for each point you had on cast.
